summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Melrose Place, in the City of Seattle, from Melrose Avenue to Howell Street, by grading and curbing the same, by constructing wood bulkheads where necessary and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2317 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
